summary: This is an internal email from a Regional Director of the Northeast Region forwarding a draft report to Jim and Marti, instructing them to use it for planning and not to share it with other staff as it is unreviewed and unapproved.

persons.name: Jim
persons.context: Recipient of an internal email containing a draft report for planning purposes.

persons.name: Marti
persons.context: Recipient of an internal email containing a draft report for planning purposes.

persons.name: Regional Director Northeast Region
persons.context: Sender of an internal email forwarding a draft report to Jim and Marti with instructions not to share it.

connections.description: The Regional Director is directing Jim to use a draft report for planning, indicating a supervisory relationship.
The Regional Director is directing Marti to use a draft report for planning, indicating a supervisory relationship.
Both are addressed together as recipients of the same internal email and draft report for planning.

events.title: Draft Report Distribution
events.description: A Regional Director forwards a draft report to Jim and Marti for planning, with instructions to keep it confidential.

keyFacts: A draft report related to planning was circulated internally on August 16, 2019.
The report was marked as unreviewed and unapproved, and sharing with other staff was prohibited.
The communication originated from a Regional Director in the Northeast Region.
